summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5689 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 6, Exposition Heights Addition, being the alley between Blakeley Street and University View Place, from 33rd Avenue Northeast to East 47 Street; by grading and paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 75238, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
